channel.title: I remember reading my Blue-Shift manual not too long ago...
channel.description:
There were 5 different shifts.
Blue - used = B. Calhoun as main protagonist. Green - unused = Not sure. Yellow - used = K. Camon as main protagonist Red - unused = Could this have been gordon's role? Purple - unused = Or this one?
I wonder if the rest of those shifts will be used for mods..

item.title: I remember reading my Blue-Shift manual not too long ago...
item.dc:creator: Omega_Absolute
item.description:
Its actually times and sectors.

Based on the times I suppose you could make a Red Shift or Yellow Shift.
But the locations in the picture don’t match up with the sectors on the wiki:
https://half-life.wikia.com/wiki/Black_Mesa_Research_Facility

Needless to say, both locations (Admin Offices and Dormitories) were already made into HL Decay. Thus invalidating any good reason to make them into a separate mod.

EDIT:
Also interestingly enough, apparently Barney has a girlfriend named Lauren.

Read full topic

item.source: I remember reading my Blue-Shift manual not too long ago...

item.title: I remember reading my Blue-Shift manual not too long ago...
item.dc:creator: Omega_Absolute
item.description:
CatzEyes93:

Another one of those “We have sunk low and have run out of things to talk about” threads.

Joebama I do not remember such a thing from any manual. (But I must admit my blue shift cd did not come with a manual) Do you have more info on this theory or did we dream it up?

Colored shifts represent a certain period of the day. If you work blue shift, you work whatever Barney was supposed to. You work green, you work the shift after that. Yellow, etc. It is indeed in the manual but no real HL fan could make a mod out of it considering the Resonance Cascade happened DURING the blue shift.

Read full topic
